title: BGCantor
description: BGCantor On-Demand is a fast, flexible and cost-effective way to access our high quality inter-dealer broker data. With industry standard web services, BGCantor On-Demand's benchmark Treasury, Fixed Income, Foreign Exchange, Futures, and Credit Derivatives data can be accessed easily and quickly over the Internet. BGCantor On-Demand is designed to enable rapid integration to your applications and add immediate value to your business.
